T06asabhs_u:14: cakṣurāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ śrotrāyatanaṃ śabdāyatanaṃ ghrāṇāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ manaāyatanaṃ dharmāyatanaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:31: kasmād dhātava āyatanāni ca sopādānadharmā ityucyante /
T06asabhs_u:40: deśena rūpaṇa midaṃ cedaṃ ca rūpamevaṃ caivaṃ ca rūpamiti praṇihitāpraṇihitacetovitarkeṇa pratibimbacitrīkāratā //
T06asabhs_u:54: vijñānaṃ yena rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmān nānā viṣayān vijānāti //
T06asabhs_u:56: yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭavān paśyati yacca tasya bījamupacitamālayavijñānaṃ taccakṣuḥ //
T06asabhs_u:59: rūpaṃ yaccakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate ca yacca tatra cakṣurdhātorādhipatyaṃ tadrūpadhātu lakṣaṇam /
T06asabhs_u:60: yathā rūpadhātu lakṣaṇaṃ tathā śabdagandharasasparśadharmadhātūnāmapi lakṣaṇāni /
T06asabhs_u:62: cakṣurāśrayā rūpālambanā rūpaprativijñaptiḥ yacca tasya bījamupacitaṃ /
T06asabhs_u:68: yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ taccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāya //
T06asabhs_u:79: cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jivhendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyānāmekadeśo dharmāyatanasaṃgṛhītaṃ ca rūpam
T06asabhs_u:92: yathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmamunnatamavanataṃ sātaṃ visātamātapaḥ chāyā āloko 'dhakāramabhraṃ dhūmo rajo mahikā ca /
T06asabhs_u:98: manojño vā amanojño vā ubhayaviparīto vā /
T06asabhs_u:99: upāttamahābhūtahetuko vā anupāttamahābhūtahetuko vā tadubhayo bālokaprasiddho vā siddhopanīto vā parikalpito vā āryairdeśito vā tīrthaidaśito vā /
T06asabhs_u:102: yathā surabhirasurabhiḥ samagandhaḥ sahajagandhaḥ sāṃyogikagandhaḥ pāriṇāmikagandhaśca //
T06asabhs_u:106: manojño vā amanojño vā ubhayaviparīto vā sahajo vā sāṃyogiko vā pāriṇāmiko vā //
T06asabhs_u:109: ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ laghutvaṃ gurūtvaṃ picchilatvaṃ mandatvamamandatvaṃ śītatvamuṣṇatvaṃ
T06asabhs_u:110: jighatsā pipāsā tṛptirbalaṃ daurbalayaṃ mūrcchā kaṇḍūtiḥ pūtirvyādhirjarāmaraṇaṃ
T06asabhs_u:118: evaṃ ṣaḍvedanā kāyāḥ sukhā vā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā //
T06asabhs_u:119: punaḥ sukhā kāyikī vedanā duḥkhā kāyikī vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā kāyikīvedanā sukhā caitasikī
T06asabhs_u:120: vedanā duḥkhā caitasikī vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā caitasikī vedanā sukhā sāmiṣavedanā duḥkhā
T06asabhs_u:121: sāmiṣavedanā aduḥkhāsukhā sāmiṣavedanā sukhā nirāmiṣavedanā duḥkhā nirāmiṣavedanā
T06asabhs_u:122: aduḥkhāsukhā nirāmiṣavedanā punaḥ sukhā gredhāśritavedanā duḥkhā gredhāśritavedanā
T06asabhs_u:123: aduḥkhāsukhā gredhāśritavedanā sukhā naiṣkramyāśritavedanā duḥkhā naiṣkramyāśritavedanā
T06asabhs_u:141: jivhākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā yathā sanimittama pi saṃjānāti animittamapi parīttamapi mahadgata mapyapramāṇamapi nāsti kiṃcidityākiṃcanyāyatanamapi saṃjānāti //
T06asabhs_u:143: avyavahārakuśalasyānimittadhātusamā pannasya bhavāgrasamāpannasya ca saṃjñāṃ sthāpayitvā yāvadanyā saṃjñā //
T06asabhs_u:156: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā cetanā śrotraghrāṇajvihākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā cetanā yayā kuśalatvāya
T06asabhs_u:157: cetayate saṃkleśāya cetayate avasthābhedāya cetayate itīyaṃ cetanā vedanāṃ saṃjñācca
T06asabhs_u:158: sthāpayitvā tadanye caitasikā dharmāścittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraskandha ityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:160: manaskāraḥ sparśaḥ cchando 'dhimokṣaḥ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñāśraddhā hīrapatrāpyamālobho
T06asabhs_u:161: 'dveṣo 'mohoḥ vīryaṃ praśrabdhirapramāda upekṣā apristhitā rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā
T06asabhs_u:163: krodha upanāhaḥ mrakṣaḥ pradāśaḥ īrṣyāḥ mātsaryaṃ śāṭhyaṃ mado vihinsā āhrikyamanapatrāpyaṃ
T06asabhs_u:164: styānamauddhatyaṃ āśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādo muṣitasmṛtitāsaṃprajanyaṃ vikṣepo
T06asabhs_u:201: sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkha sthānīyeṣu ca dharme ṣvanāghātaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:204: vipākato vā āgamato vādhigamato vā jñānaṃ pratisaṃkhyā /
T06asabhs_u:207: kuśale cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ sannāhe vā prayoge vā alīnatve vā avyāvṛttau vā asantuṣṭau vā /
T06asabhs_u:213: savīryakānalobhādveṣāmohanniśritya yā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmbhāvanā sāsravebhyaśca dharmebhyaścittārakṣā /
T06asabhs_u:216: savīryakānalobhādveṣāmohānniśritya yā saṃkliṣṭavihāravairodhikī cittasamatā cittapraśaṭhatā cittasyānābhogāvasthitatā /
T06asabhs_u:236: pañcopādānaskandhānātmataḥ ātmīyato vā samanupaśyato yā kṣāntī rūcirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:240: to vā ucchedato vā samanupaśyataḥ yā kṣāntī rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:243: dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭayāśrayāṃśca pañcopādānaskandhānagrataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataśca samanupaśyato yā kṣānti rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭi /
T06asabhs_u:247: śca pañcopādānaskandhān śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataśca samanupaśyato yā kṣāntī rūcirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:250: hetuṃ vāpavadataḥ phalaṃ vā kriyāṃ vā sadvā vastu nāśayataḥ mithyā ca vikalpayato yā kṣānti rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:254: yā etāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayaḥ āsāṃ kati samāropadṛṣṭayaḥ katyapavāddṛṣṭayaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:255: catasraḥ samāropadṛṣṭayaḥ jñeye svabhāvaviśeṣasamāropatāmupādāya dṛṣṭau cāgraśuddhisamāropatāmupādāya /
T06asabhs_u:260: yā avyākṛtacastuṣu dṛṣṭayastāḥ katibhyo dṛṣṭibhyo veditavyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:262: kaṃ doṣaṃ paśyatā bhagavatā skandhadhātvāyatanegu pañcamiḥ kāraṇairātmā pratikṣiptaḥ
T06asabhs_u:263: satkāyadṛṣṭiparigṛhītān pañca doṣān paśyatā vilakṣaṇatādoṣaṃ anityatādoṣaṃ asvāsthya
T06asabhs_u:265: yā pañcasūpādānaskadheṣu viṃśatikoṭikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ rūpa[mā]tmeti samanupaśyati rūpavantamātmānamātmīyaṃ (rūpaṃ)
T06asabhs_u:266: rūpe ātmānaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānamātmeti samanupaśyati vijñānavantamātmānamātmīyaṃ
T06asabhs_u:267: vijñānaṃ vijñāne ātmānaṃ tatra katyātmadṛṣṭayaḥ katyātmīyadṛṣṭayaḥ pañcātmadṛṣṭayaḥ
T06asabhs_u:277: upanohaḥ katamaḥ tata ūrdhvaṃ pratighāṃśika eva vairāśayasyānutsargaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:286: lābhasatkārā dhyavasitasya parasaṃpattiviśeṣe dveṣāṃśikaḥ a[marṣa] kṛtaścetaso vyāropaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:299: ārogyaṃ vā āgamya yauvanaṃ vā dīrghāyuṣkalakṣaṇaṃ vopalabhyanyatamānyatamāṃ vā sāsravāṃ saṃpattiṃ rāgāṃśikannandīsaumanasyam /
T06asabhs_u:323: sakausīdyān rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhāvanā sāsravebhyaśca dharmebhyaścetaso 'nārakṣā /
T06asabhs_u:329: kleśasaṃprayuktā prajñā yayā asaṃviditā kāyavākcittacaryā pravartate /
T06asabhs_u:333: sa punaḥ svabhāvavikṣepaḥ bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ adhyātmavikṣepaḥ nimi(tta)
T06asabhs_u:345: ahaṃkāramamakārāsmimānapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyamāganya kuśalaprayuktasyotpannotpanneṣu vediteṣvahamiti vā mameti vā asmīti vā udgraho vyavakiraṇā nimittīkāraḥ //
T06asabhs_u:347: samapattyantaraṃ vā yānāntaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya saṃśrayato vā yo visāraḥ /
T06asabhs_u:349: middhanimittamāgamya mohāṃśikaścetaso 'bhisaṃkṣepaḥ kuśalaḥ akuśalaḥ avyākṛtaḥ kāle vā akāle vā yukto vā ayukto vā /
T06asabhs_u:356: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā paryeṣako manojalpaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:359: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā pratyavekṣako manojalpaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:362: api khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svavipakṣaprahāṇaṃ karma /
T06asabhs_u:366: jātirjarā sthitiranityatā nāmakāyāḥ padakāyāḥ vyañjanakāyāḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ pravṛttiḥ
T06asabhs_u:367: pratiniyamo yogaḥ javo 'nukramaḥ kālo deśaḥ saṃkhyā sāmagrī ca //
T06asabhs_u:369: kuśalakuśalāṃnāṃ dharmāṇāmācayāpacaye prāptiḥ pratilagbhaḥ samanvāgama iti prajñaptiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:371: śubhakṛtsnavītarāgasyoparyavītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhe asaṃjñisamāpattiriti prajñaptiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:374: manasikāreṇāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhe nirodhasamāpattiriti prajñaptiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:380: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃ stasmin sattvanikāye ātmabhāvasadṛśatāyāṃ nikāyasabhāga iti prajñaptiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:393: vyañjanakāyāḥ katameḥ tadubhayāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu vyañjanakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:413: pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarā dharordhvāsu sarvato daśasu dikṣu hetuphala eva deśa iti prajñaptiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:426: tacca sarvatragaṃ kuśale 'pyakuśale 'pyavyākṛte 'pi sthāpayitvā mārgasabhmukhībhāvaṃ nirodhasamāpattimaśaikṣa bhūmiṃ ca yacca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ vijñānam //
T06asabhs_u:444: cakṣurdhātuḥ rūpadhātuḥ śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ ghrāṇadhātuḥ gandhadhātuḥ jivhādhātuḥ rasadhātuḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ mano dhātvekadeśaśca
T06asabhs_u:451: kuśaladharmatathatā akuśaladharmatathatā avyākṛtadharmatathatā ākāśam apratisaṃkhyā nirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ āniṃjyaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaśca
T06asabhs_u:454: sā punarucyate śūnyatā animittaṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ paramārtho dharmādhātuśca //
T06asabhs_u:468: sarveṣāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca buddha dharmanimittāśrayatāmupādāya //
T06asabhs_u:469: yathā kuśalaladharmatathatā tathā akuśaladharmatathatā avyākṛta dharmatathatā ca jñeyā //
T06asabhs_u:479: ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāgasya bhāvāgrāduccalitasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāmanasikārapūrvakeṇa asthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca sthāvarāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:480: paṃcarūpāṇi vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāraskandhāḥ te 'ṣṭau asaṃskṛtā dharmāścaivaṃ te ṣoḍaśa dharmadhātava ucyante /
T06asabhs_u:485: anene nayena skandhadhātvāyatanāni triṣu dharmeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:493: yathā aṇḍe vā kalale vā arvude vā peśyāṃ vā mātuḥkukṣau vālabdhaṃ cakṣurlabdhaṃ vā naṣṭam /
T06asabhs_u:499: yathā cakṣuśya cakṣurdhātuśca tathā śrotraghrāṇajivhākāya dhātavo yathāyogyaṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:500: kiṃ syānmano 'pi manodhāturapi ahosvit syānmanodhāturapi mano 'pi /
T06asabhs_u:510: tadbhūmāvutpannaḥ kiṃ tadbhūmikena cakṣuṣā tadbhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyati /
T06asabhs_u:513: kāmadhātāvapapannaḥ māvacareṇa cakṣuṣā kāmāvacarāṇi rūpāṇi paśyati /
T06asabhs_u:515: yathā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi pratigṛṇhāti tatha śrotreṇa śabdaṃ pratigṛṇhāti /
T06asabhs_u:516: yathā kāmadhātāvutpannastathā rūpadhātāvutpannaḥ kāmāvacareṇa ghrāṇena jivhayā kāyena cā kāmāvacarān gandhān jighrati rasānāsvādane sparśān budhyati ca //
T06asabhs_u:517: rūpadhātāvutpanno rūpāvacareṇa kāyena svabhūmikān sparśān budhyati /
T06asabhs_u:521: kāmadhātāvutpannaḥ kāmāvacareṇa manasā traidhātukānanāsravāṃśca dharmāna vijānāti //
T06asabhs_u:523: ārūpyadhātāvutpanna ārūpyāvacareṇa manasā ārūpyāvacarān svabhūmikānanāsravāṃśca dharmān vijānāti /
T06asabhs_u:531: yathā cetayate tathā vijñānaṃ tatra tatropagaṃ bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:534: vedanānimittagrahaṇābhisaṃskāreṇa saṃkleśavyavadānābhyāṃ ca saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ca /
T06asabhs_u:542: vyatisārya snāpitaṃ gandhaṃ mālyaṃ ca paricarati /
T06asabhs_u:551: atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamadhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre yadvāntike tatsarvamabhisaṃkṣipyocyate rūpaskandhaḥ rāśyarthamupādaya /
T06asabhs_u:558: api ca saṃkleśato bhāravahanatāmupādāya skandha ucyate /
T06asabhs_u:567: yathā buddhena bhāṣitam rūpaṃ budbudopamaṃ vedanā phenopamā saṃjñā marīcikopamā saṃskārāḥ parṇo pamā vijñānaṃ māyopamamiti /
T06asabhs_u:568: kimarthaṃ rūpaṃ budbudopamaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ māyopamamiti /
T06asabhs_u:576: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu kathaṃ dravyamat kati dvayamanti kimarthaṃ dravyamatparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:597: kathaṃ jñeyaṃ kati jñeyāni kimarthaṃ jñeyaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:599: rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā dharmāścittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:600: yatra saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ vayat saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate vā yaśca saṃkleśayati vyavadāyayati vā yā ca tatrāvasthā yā ca vyavadānatā tadāśrayeṇa sarvaṃ jñeyam //
T06asabhs_u:601: tatra rūpaṃ rūpaskandho daśarūpadhātavo daśa rūpāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanasaṃgṛhītāni ca rūpāṇi //
T06asabhs_u:603: caitasikā dharmā vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca /
T06asabhs_u:604: cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ citta viprayuktaḥ saṃskāraskandho dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca //
T06asabhs_u:606: api khalu jñeyā dharmāḥ adhimuktijñānagocarato 'pi yuktijñānagocarato 'pi avisārajñānagocarato
T06asabhs_u:611: (Abhidh-s 17) kathaṃ vijñeyaṃ kati vijñeyāni kimarthaṃ vijñeyaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:612: avikalpanato 'pi vikalpanato 'pi hetuto 'pi pravṛttito 'pi nimittato 'pi naimittakato 'pi vipakṣapratipakṣato 'pi sūkṣmaprabhedato 'pi vijñeyaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:616: saṃkrāntito 'pi anuśravato 'pi caritapraveśato 'pi āgatito 'pi gatito 'pi niḥsaraṇato 'pi /
T06asabhs_u:619: kathaṃ rūpi kati rūpīṇi kimarthaṃ rūpiparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:620: rūpi tadātmato 'pi bhūtāśrayato 'pi nandīsamudayato 'pi pradeśato 'pi deśavyāptito 'pi deśopade(śa)
T06asabhs_u:621: to 'pi deśagocarato 'pi dvayasamaya gocarato 'pi sambandhato 'pya nuvandhato 'pi
T06asabhs_u:623: 'pi antarmukhato 'pi āyatato 'pi parichinnato 'pi tatkālato 'pi nidarśanato 'pi rūpi draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:630: kathaṃ sanidarśanaṃ kati sanidarśanāni kimarthaṃ sanidarśanaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:639: kathaṃ sapratighaṃ kati sapratighāni kimarthaṃ sapratigha parīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:641: api khalu tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sapratighaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:642: jātito 'pi upacayato 'pi aparikarmakṛtato 'pi tatra jātitaḥ yadya(da)
T06asabhs_u:654: kathaṃ sāsravaṃ kati sāsravāṇi kimarthaṃ sāsravaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:655: āsravatadātmato 'pi āsravasaṃbandhato 'pi āsravānuvandhato 'pi āsravānukūlyato 'pi āsravānvayato 'pi sāsravaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:656: pañcopādānaskandhāḥ sāsravāḥ pañcadaśa dhātavo daśāyatanāni trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:662: kathaṃ saraṇaṃ kati saraṇāni kimarthaṃ saraṇaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:672: kathaṃ sāmiṣaṃ kati sāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ sāmiṣaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:678: kathaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ kati nirāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ nirāmiṣaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:682: kathaṃ gredhāśritaṃ kati gredhā śritāni kimarthaṃ gredhāśritaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:684: tabdandhato 'pi tadanubandhato 'pi tadānukulyato 'pi tadanvayato 'pi gredhāśritaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:687: kathaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ kati naiṣkramyāśritāni kimarthaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:691: kathaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ kati saṃskṛtāni kimarthaṃ saṃskṛtaparīkṣā yasyotpā do 'pi prajñāyate vyayo 'pi sthityanyathātvamapi tatsarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ draṣṭavyam
T06asabhs_u:703: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti [?] //
T06asabhs_u:705: yenāsaṃskṛtaṃ na tenārthena saṃskṛtamityatra nayo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:706: kathaṃ laukikaṃ kati laukikāni kimarthaṃ laukikaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:707: traidhātukaparyāpannaṃ laukikaṃ lokottara pṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ ca tatpratibhāsam /
T06asabhs_u:708: skandhānāmekadeśaḥ pañcadaśa dhātavaḥ daśāyatanāni trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:710: kathaṃ lokottaraṃ kati lokottarāṇi kimarthaṃ lokottaraparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:713: api khalu paryāyeṇa loko ttarapṛṣṭalabdhaṃ lokottaram /
T06asabhs_u:722: ādyutpannaṃ prabandhotpannam upacayotpannam āśrayotpannaṃ vikārotpannaṃ paripākotpannaṃ
T06asabhs_u:726: pūrvakālotpannaṃ maraṇakālo tpannam antarotpannaṃ pratisandhikālotpannaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:732: kathaṃ grāhakaṃ kati grāhakāṇi kimarthaṃ grāhakaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:734: trayaḥ skandhā rūpasaṃskāraskandhaikadeśaḥ dvādaśa dhātavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca /
T06asabhs_u:736: api khalu aprāptagrāhakaṃ prāptagrāhakaṃ svalakṣaṇavarttamānapratyeka grāhakaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇasarvakālaṃ sarvaviṣayagrāhakaṃ ca grāhakaṃ draṣṭavyam
T06asabhs_u:739: kathaṃ grāhyaṃ kati grāhyāni kimarthaṃ grāhyaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:745: kathaṃ vahirmukhaṃ kati bahirmukhāni kimarthaṃ bahirmukha parīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:746: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ bahirmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā buddhaśāsane śrutamayacintāmayatadanudharmaparigṛhītāṃ ścittacaitasikān dharmān /
T06asabhs_u:747: ca tvāro dhātavaḥ dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ caikadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:751: catuto dhātūn sthāpayitvā dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāmekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:753: (Abhidh-s 21) kathaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kati kliṣṭāni kimarthaṃ kliṣṭaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:755: nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ punaḥ sarvatragamanaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ kleśo rūpārūpya pratisaṃyu(kta)śca /
T06asabhs_u:760: aṣṭau dhātavaḥ aṣṭāyatanāni skandhānāṃ śeṣāṇāṃ ca dhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:763: utpannaniruddha lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalopayo gato 'pi saṃkleśavyavadānakāritra samatikrāntito
T06asabhs_u:768: hetau satya nutpannato 'pi alabdhasva lakṣaṇato 'pi hetuphalānupayogato 'pi saṃkleśavyavadānabhāvā
T06asabhs_u:769: pratyupasthānato 'pi hetusvabhā vābhāvato 'pi abhinandanāsaṃkleśa nimittato 'pi abhinandanāvyavadānanimittato
T06asabhs_u:773: kathaṃ pratyutpannaṃ kati pratyutpannāni kimarthaṃ pratyutpannaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:775: 'pi atītānāgata bhāva nimittato 'pi kāritrapratyupasthānato 'pi pratyutpannaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:782: svabhāvato 'pi sambandhato 'pi anubandhato 'pi utthānato 'pi paramārthato 'pi upapattilābhato
T06asabhs_u:785: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātunāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatānānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:787: svabhāvataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat śraddhādaya ekādaśa caitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:797: eṣāmeva kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pūrvābhyāsamāgamyaṃ tadrūpā vipākābhinirvṛtiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:798: yathā teṣveva prakṛtyā apratisaṃkhyāya rūciḥ saṃtiṣṭhate //
T06asabhs_u:800: satpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamya saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāraṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiṃ kuśalasya bhāvanā //
T06asabhs_u:802: yattathāgataṃ vā puraskṛtya caitye vā pustagate vā citragate dharmaṃ vā puraskṛtya dharmādhiṣṭhāni pustake pūjākarma //
T06asabhs_u:806: yaddānamayena puṇyakriyāvastunā vā śīlamayena vā svargopapattiparigraho vā āḍhyo kulopapattiparigraho vā vyavadānānukūlyaparigraho vā pratipakṣataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat /
T06asabhs_u:807: yo vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣa dūrobhāva pratipakṣaḥ viṣkambhaṇāpratipakṣaḥ visaṃyogapratipakṣaḥ kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣaḥ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣaḥ
T06asabhs_u:809: yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya
T06asabhs_u:810: sarvakleśaprahāṇaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaḥ sopadhiśeṣo nirupadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhāturapratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:812: upaśamaprāptasya tadādhipatyena vaiśeṣikā guṇā abhijñādayo laukikalokottarāḥ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:814: svabhāvato 'pi saṃbandhato 'pi anubandhato 'pi utthānato 'pi paramārthato 'pi upapattilābhato 'pi prayogato 'pi puraskārato 'pi upaghātato 'pi parigrahato 'pi (Abhidh-s 23)
T06asabhs_u:819: manaḥsaṃprayuktaṃ rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kleśaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ klaśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpakaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:828: yathāpi tadakuśalā bhyāsa stūdapo vipāko 'bhinivarttate yenākuśala eva rūciḥ santiṣṭhate //
T06asabhs_u:830: yathāpi tadasatpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamyasaddharmaśravaṇamayoni śomanaskāraṃ kāyena duścaritaṃ carati vācā manasā duścarītaṃ carati //
T06asabhs_u:832: yathāpi tadanyatamānyatamaṃ devanikāyasanniśrayaṃ puraskṛtya hiṃsāpūrvakaṃ vā kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ
T06asabhs_u:833: vā caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati tatra vā pūjākarma prayojayati yatra mahān janakāyo 'puṇyena yujyate /
T06asabhs_u:835: yathāpi tatsattveṣu kāyena vācā manasā mithyā pratipadyate //
T06asabhs_u:837: yathā tatkāyena duścaritaṃ caritvā vācā manasā duścaritaṃ caritvā durgatau vā sugatau vā aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ gṛṇhātyakṣepakaṃ vā paripūrakaṃ vā //
T06asabhs_u:840: pari panthato 'kuśalaṃ katamat ye kuśalāntarāyikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:842: svābhāvato 'pi sambandhato 'pi anubandhato 'pi utthānato 'pi paramārthato 'pi upapattilābhato
T06asabhs_u:843: 'pi prayogato 'pi puraskārato 'pi anugrahato 'pi upabhogato 'pi parigrahato 'pi pratipakṣato
T06asabhs_u:848: aṣṭau rūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni sasaṃprayogaṃ manojīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgo nāma kāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyāśca //
T06asabhs_u:850: aduṣṭāprasannacittasya taireva nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ parigṛhītāḥ cittacaitasikā (Abhidh-s 24) dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:859: prayogato 'vyākṛtaṃ katamat akliṣṭākuśalacetasa airyāpathikaṃ śailpasthānikaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:861: yathāpi tadanyatamānyatamaṃ devanikāyasanniśrayaṃ puraskṛtya hiṃsākudṛṣṭi vivarjitaṃ
T06asabhs_u:862: caityaṃ vā pratiṣṭhāpayati pūjākarma vā prayojayati yatra mahājanakāyo na puṇyaṃ
T06asabhs_u:865: yathāpi taddāsabhṛtakakarmakareṣu putradāreṣu vā aduṣṭāprasannacitto dānaṃ dadāti //
T06asabhs_u:869: yathāpi tacchilpasthānasyābhyastatvādāyatyāṃ tadrūpaṃ mātmabhāvaparigrahaṃ karoti yena laghu ladhveva teṣu śilpasthāneṣu śikṣāniṣṭhāṃ gacchati
T06asabhs_u:878: yadbuddhāḥ paramapāramiprāptāśca bodhisattvā nidarśayanti sattvānāmanugrahārthaṃ na tu teṣāṃ tatra tathā kācit pariniṣpattiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:882: catvāro dhātavo dve cāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:886: caturo dhātūna dve cāyatane sthāpayitā tadanyeṣāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:892: vairāgyaṃ punarekadeśavairāgyaṃ skalavairāgyaṃ prativedhavairāgyamupaghātavairāgyaṃ samudghātavairāgyaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:895: pratipakṣavairāgyaṃ parijñāvairāgyaṃ prahāṇi vairāgyaṃ sottaravairāgyaṃ niruttaravairāgyam //
T06asabhs_u:897: duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dhamaṣu yā pratikulatā //
T06asabhs_u:903: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptava to nirhīne sthāne yā pratikūlatā //
T06asabhs_u:907: laukikena vā lokottareṇa vā mārgeṇa yatkleśaprahāṇam //
T06asabhs_u:911: bhūmau bhūmau kleśān prajahato yā pratikūlatā //
T06asabhs_u:916: kathaṃ śaikṣaṃ kati śaikṣāṇi kimarthaṃ śaikṣaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:922: skandhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:924: kathaṃ naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣaṃ kati naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāni kimarthaṃ naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣa parīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:925: pṛthagjanasya kuśalākuśalāvyakṛtaṃ śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamaśaikṣasya cāvyākṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:929: kathaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ kati darśanaprahātavyāni kimarthaṃ darśanaprahātavyaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:930: parikalpitā kliṣṭā dṛṣṭiḥ vicikitsādṛṣṭisthānaṃ ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśāḥ
T06asabhs_u:931: yacca dṛṣṭyā samutthāpitaṃ kāyavā kkarma sarvaṃ cāpāyikaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06asabhs_u:934: kathaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ kati bhāvanāprahātavyāni kimarthaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:940: skaṃdhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:942: kathaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ kati pratītyasamutpannāni kimarthaṃ pratītyasamutpannaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:952: dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ avidyā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopadānaṃ bhavo jāti rjarāmaraṇaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:964: vāsanāto 'pyāvedhato 'pi manasikārato 'pi sahabhāvato 'pyāṅgānāṃ pratyayatvavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ tacca yathāyogam //
T06asabhs_u:970: gatiṣu ca sattvān vibhajanti pratyayāśca bhavanti vijñānavāsanāyāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:972: sattvānāṃ karmabandhaṃ ca dhārayati pratyayaśca bhavati nāmarūpasya //
T06asabhs_u:974: ātmabhāvaṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratyayaśca bhavati ṣaḍāyatanasya //
T06asabhs_u:976: ātmabhāvaparipūriṃ ca sattvān grāhayati pratya yaśca bhavati sparśasya //
T06asabhs_u:978: viṣayopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati vedanāyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:980: janmopabhoge ca sattvān pravarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati tṛṣṇāyāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:982: janmani ca sattvānākarṣayati pratyayaśca bhavati upādānasya //
T06asabhs_u:984: punarbhavādānārthaṃ sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti pratyayaśca bhavati bhavasya //
T06asabhs_u:986: punarbhave ca sattvānabhimukhīkaroti pratyayaśca bhavati jāteḥ //
T06asabhs_u:988: nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanānupūrvyā ca sattvānabhinirvarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati jarāmaraṇasya //
T06asabhs_u:992: yā cāvidyā yā ca tṛṣṇā yaccopādānamityayaṃ saṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:993: ye ca saṃskārā yacca vijñānaṃ yaśca bhava ityayaṃ karmasaṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:998: anityārthaḥ kṣaṇikārthaḥ hetuphalaprabandhānupacchedārthaḥ anurūpahetuphalārthaḥ vicitrahetuphalārthaḥ pratiniyatahetuphalārthaśca pratītyasamutpādārthaḥ
T06asabhs_u:1000: hetu gāmbhīryato 'pi lakṣaṇagāmbhīryato 'pi utpattibhāgāmbhīryato 'pi sthitigāmbhīryato 'pi vṛttigāmbhīryato 'pi gāmbhīryaṃ draṣṭavyam //
T06asabhs_u:1004: na svato na parato na dvābhyāṃ na svayaṃkārāpa(ra)
T06asabhs_u:1015: kathaṃ pratyayaḥ kati pratyayāḥ kimarthaṃ pratyayaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:1021: api khalu svabhāvato 'pi prabhedato 'pi sahāyato 'pi saṃpratipattito 'pi paripanthato 'pi parigrahato 'pi hetupratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1026: sthitikāraṇaṃ tadyathā āhāro bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:1050: tadyathā vijñānasya indriyamaparibhinnaṃ viṣaya ābhāsagataḥ tajjaśca manaskāraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1063: pūrvabhāvitānāṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭatarā puṣṭatamā pravṛttiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1079: dhipatito 'pi lokottaraviśuddhya dhipatito 'pi adhipati pratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1080: kathaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaṃ kati sabhāgatatsabhāgāni kimarthaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:1086: rūpaskandhaikadeśaḥ pañca rūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni - caturṇāṃ caikadeśaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1092: vedanāskandho vijñānaskandha rūpasaṃskāraskandhaikadeśaḥ dvādaśa dhātavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca /
T06asabhs_u:1094: kathaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā kati duḥkhaduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:1098: kathaṃ viparīṇāmaduḥkhatā kati viparīṇāmaduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:1099: sukhavedanāvipariṇatisvalakṣaṇato 'pi sukhavedanīyadharmavipariṇatisvalakṣaṇato 'pi tatra cānunayacittavipariṇatito 'pi vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā draṣṭavyā
T06asabhs_u:1102: kathaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatā kati saṃskāraduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:1105: skandhānāṃ trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayorekadeśaṃ sthāpayitvā sarvāṇi /
T06asabhs_u:1107: kathaṃ savipākaṃ kati savipākāni kimarthaṃ savipākaparīkṣā /
T06asabhs_u:1114: pariṇatito 'pi pāriṇāmikaḥ viṣayato 'pi vaiṣayikaḥ āśayato 'pyāśi (? śayi)
T06asabhs_u:1118: api khalvāhāro 'śuddhā śrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ sthitisāṃdarśinakaśca draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1132: skandhadhātvāyataneṣvātmeti vā sattvo jīvo jantuḥ poṣo pugdalo manujo mānava iti vā yatparikalpyate //
T06asabhs_u:1142: teṣāmevaskandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ dravyamantaḥ prajñaptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamantaḥ rūpiṇo 'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādi yathānirddiṣṭaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1155: api khalu ṣaḍvidhaḥ prabhedaḥ eṣāmeva skandhadhātvāyatananām /
T06asabhs_u:1156: bahirmukhaprabhedaḥ antarmukhaprabhedaḥ āyata kālabhedaḥ paricchinnakālaprabhedaḥ tatkālaprabhedaḥ saṃdarśanaprabhedaśca /
T06asabhs_u:1169: buddhānāṃ pāramiprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca sanidarśanāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni // 0 //
T06asabhs_u:1173: lakṣaṇasaṃgrahaḥ dhātusaṃgrahaḥ jātisaṃgrahaḥ avasthāsaṃgrahaḥ sahāyasaṃgrahaḥ deśasaṃgrahaḥ
T06asabhs_u:1187: evaṃ tadanye skandhā dhātava āyatanāni ca /
T06asabhs_u:1195: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśa saṃgraho veditavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1197: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1198: itaretarasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ rūpaskandhasaṃgrahe kati dhātavaḥ katyāyatanāni /
T06asabhs_u:1222: tadvat tadanye dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanairnirdṛśyante anye ca na skandhadhātvāyatanairnirddiśyante /
T06asabhs_u:1223: yathā dravyamantaḥ prajñāptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamanto jñeyā vijñeyā abhijñeyā rūpiṇo 'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādayaḥ pūrvaṃ nirdṛṣṭāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1228: yathā yathā ālambaneṣu cittābhisaṃkṣepaḥ tathā tathā kuśalamūlābhivṛddhiḥ // 0 //
T06asabhs_u:1232: avinirbhāga saṃprayogaḥ miśrībhāva saṃprayogaḥ samavadhānasaṃprayogaḥ sahabhāvasaṃprayogaḥ kṛtyānuṣṭhānasaṃprayogaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaśca
T06asabhs_u:1236: (Abhidh-s 34) paramāṇorūrdhvaṃ sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ rūpāṃśikānāṃ parasparaṃ miśrībhāvaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1240: ekasmin kāye skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sahakālapravṛttiḥ samamutpatti sthitinirodhāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1252: api khalu kliṣṭasarvatragaḥ saṃprayogo manasi caturṇṇāṃ kleśānām //
T06asabhs_u:1253: kādācitkaḥ saṃprayogastadyathā citte śraddhādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ ca kleśopakleśānām //
T06asabhs_u:1258: bahirmukhaḥ saṃprayogo yadbhūyasā kāma pratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittacaitasikānām //
T06asabhs_u:1260: ucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ pārthagjanikānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇām //
T06asabhs_u:1261: anucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ lokottarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāmādyataduttarāṇāṃ lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhānāṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:1263: cittamātre vedanādīnāṃ sāṃkleśikānāṃvyāvadānikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ saṃprayogaṃ jānāti /
T06asabhs_u:1264: tacca jānanātmā vedayate saṃjānāti cetayate smarati saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate cetayatya bhiniveśaṃ prajahāti nairātmyamavatarati //
T06asabhs_u:1272: kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktaiśca kleśopakleśairvījasamancāgamena samancāgataḥ upapattiprātilābhikaiśca
T06asabhs_u:1274: rūpadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ klaiśopakleśaiḥ vījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1279: traidhātu kapratipakṣa lābhī yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpannastasya bījasamanvāgamenāsamanvāgataḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1282: prayogikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vaśitāsamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ vā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyādīnāṃ tadekatyājāṃ(cā)
T06asabhs_u:1285: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ yo ya eva dharmaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kuśalo vā akuśalo vā avyākṛto vā tasya samudācārasamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1286: samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato 'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1291: tathā ācayāpacayajño na kasyāṃ cillaukikyāṃ saṃpattau vipattau vā ekāntikasaṃjñī bhavati yāvadevānunayapratighaprahāṇāya //
T06asabhs_u:1302: narakasattvajanmatiryakpreteṣu manuṣyeṣu pūrvavideheṣvapagodānīyeṣu jāmbūdvīpeṣu uttareṣu kuruṣu deveṣu caturmā(hā)
T06asabhs_u:1303: rājakāyikeṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu brahmapurohiteṣu mahābrāhmeṣuparīttābheṣva (pramāṇābheṣu ābhāsvareṣu
T06asabhs_u:1311: pṛthivīmaṇḍale sumeruḥ saptakāñcanaparvatāḥ catvāro dvīpāḥ aṣṭāvantaradvīpāḥ abhyantaraḥ
T06asabhs_u:1313: sthānāntarāṇi cakracāḍaḥ parvataḥ ākāśe vimānāni yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ
T06asabhs_u:1314: paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ devānāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca asurāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi nārakāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi /
T06asabhs_u:1315: uṣṇanarakāḥśītanarakāḥ pratyekanarakāśca tadekatyānāṃ ca tiryakpretānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi
T06asabhs_u:1316: yāvadādityāḥ paricaranto diśo 'vabhāsayante vairocanāstāvatsāhasrake loke sahasraṃ
T06asabhs_u:1317: candrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryaṇāṃ sahasraṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarājāṇāṃ sahasraṃ caturṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ
T06asabhs_u:1318: sahasraṃ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sahasraṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sahasraṃ yāmānāṃ
T06asabhs_u:1319: sahasraṃ tuṣitānāṃ sahasraṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ sahasraṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ sahasraṃ
T06asabhs_u:1324: evaṃ sa trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ mahācakravāḍa parvatamaṇḍala pariveṣṭitaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1326: tathā ca devaḥ cakrākārān vṛṣṭivindūn nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mākāśād varṣati /
T06asabhs_u:1327: tathā ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mapramāṇo lokadhātuḥ saṃvarttiṣyate vā vivarttiṣyate vā saṃvarttate vā saṃvṛttastiṣṭhati vā vivarttate vā vivṛttastiṣṭhati vā /
T06asabhs_u:1328: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi tathā sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu /
T06asabhs_u:1329: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśaḥ janitaḥ karmakleśādhipateyaśca sarvamucyate duḥkhasatyam /
T06asabhs_u:1330: pariśuddhalokadhātustu na duḥkhasatyasaṃgṛhīḥto na karmakleśa janitaḥ na karmakleśādhipateyaśca /
T06asabhs_u:1331: kevalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānena vyavadānakuśalamūlādhipatinā ākṛṣyate tadutpattisthānaṃ cācintyaṃ kevalaṃ buddhena budhyate na dhyāyināṃ dhyānagocaraḥ kiṃ punaḥ cintayatām //
T06asabhs_u:1333: “jātirduḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhaṃ
T06asabhs_u:1334: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham” //
T06asabhs_u:1352: saṃvādhaduḥkhaṃ vipariṇati duḥkhaṃ saṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ viprayogaduḥkhaṃ kāmyaphalābhāvaduḥkhaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:1357: tatra kathaṃ tisṛṣu saṃgṛhītānyaṣṭau aṣṭasu vā saṃgṛhītāstisraḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1359: jātirdukhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhamiti santānaduḥkhaduḥkhatā /
T06asabhs_u:1360: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ tadvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
T06asabhs_u:1363: tat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ paramārthasatyena duḥkhaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:1364: katamat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ katamat paramārthasatyena duḥkham /
T06asabhs_u:1365: jātirduḥkhaṃ yāvat yadapīcchann labhate tadapi duḥkhamiti saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkham /
T06asabhs_u:1366: yaduktaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paramārthasatyena duḥkham //
T06asabhs_u:1372: kṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ prabandhalakṣaṇaṃ vyādhyādi lakṣaṇaṃ cittacittākāravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ bhogasaṃpattirvipatti
T06asabhs_u:1397: kadācit sārāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati kadācid vītarāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
T06asabhs_u:1398: yadvat sadveṣaṃ vā vītadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkṣiptaṃ vā vihisāṃ vā
T06asabhs_u:1399: nimnaṃ vā unnataṃ vā uddhataṃ vā anuddhataṃ vā upaśāntaṃ vā anupaśāntaṃ vā samāhita vā asamāhitaṃ vā /
T06asabhs_u:1405: tisṛṇāṃ saṃvarttarnānāṃ śīrṣāṇi dvitīya tṛtīya caturthadhyānāni /
T06asabhs_u:1406: caturthadhyāne vāhyānāṃ vimānānāṃ tu vāhyābhāvat eva saṃvarttavivarttaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1407: kevalaṃ tairdevaiḥ tāni vimānāni saha nirvarttante saha nirudhyante etaducyate saṃvartta vivarttaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1420: sattvā āyuḥkṣayād vā puṇya kṣayād vā karmakṣayād vā tasmādadhiṣṭhānāt cyavante iti /
T06asabhs_u:1430: tisro duḥkhatāḥ aṣṭākā vā duḥkhaṃ ṣaḍākāraṃ vā (Abhidh-s 40)
T06asabhs_u:1431: duḥkhaṃ bāhulyena pūrvamuktaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ nāma /
T06asabhs_u:1432: kiṃ pratītyasūtre uktaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
T06asabhs_u:1437: tathā ca saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mayā yatkiṃcid veditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti //
T06asabhs_u:1438: api khalu utpādavyayadharmadvayānugateṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādayo 'ṣṭau duḥkhāni /
T06asabhs_u:1439: prajñāyante ityabhisaṃdhāya buddhena bhāṣitaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti /
T06asabhs_u:1440: api ca anityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ prajñāyate iti anityato duḥkhaṃ na sarve saṃskārā ityatrādhisandhirveditavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1453: tacca ātmano nāstitā anātmano 'stitā satī śūnyatā //
T06asabhs_u:1465: etadabhisaṃghāyoktaṃ bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti //
T06asabhs_u:1466: api coktaṃ bhagavatā naitat sarvaṃ mama naiṣo 'hamasmi na me sa ātmā iti /
T06asabhs_u:1467: evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajñāya draṣṭhavyam iti tasya ko 'rtha uktaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1476: yathā cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatā tathā rūpādīnāmapi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā /
T06asabhs_u:1477: cittopāttatāmupādāya cittaikayogakṣematāmupādāya cittavikāratadvikāratāmupādāya cittāśrayatāmudāpādāya cittādhipatyasaṃbhūtatāmupādāya cittvaśavarttināṃ copādāya //
T06asabhs_u:1478: api khalu atyantavikāropālabdhitāmupādāya utpannasya cānapekṣya pratyayaṃ svarasavināśitāmupādāya rūpasyāpi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā //
T06asabhs_u:1479: yaduktaṃ yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvantaccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāyeti /
T06asabhs_u:1483: yatra punaḥ samudāye yadbhūtamupalabhyate tattatrā stiti vaktavya /
T06asabhs_u:1486: upādāyarūpe 'pi yadupādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāya upalabhyate tattatrāstīti veditavyam //
T06asabhs_u:1487: yatpunarūcyate paramāṇusaṃcitto rūpa samudāya iti tatra niḥśarīraḥ (Abhidh-s 42)
T06asabhs_u:1489: buddhyā paryantaprabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāvibhāghanatāmupādāya rūpe dravyāḥ pariniṣpattipraveśatāṃ copādāya //
T06asabhs_u:1490: tat punaretad duḥkhamasti vipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitā saṃlikhitaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:1491: asti madhyamasaṃlikhitam asti tanukamasaṃlikhitam asti tanuttaraṃ saṃlikhitam asti tanutamaṃ saṃlikhitam astyaduḥkhaṃ duḥkhapratibhāsaṃ mahāsaṃlekhapratyupasthānaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:1513: paṭuka eva cittaprakāre svākuśalamulabalādhā nato vā paropasaṃhārato vā akuśalacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
T06asabhs_u:1514: paṭuke vā cittaprakāre apaṭuke vā tadubhayavai kalyādabhisaṃskārāsamarthasya vā avyākṛtacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam //
T06asabhs_u:1518: tadyathā kṛṣṇasya kutapasya nirbhāso 'ndhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1519: aśubhakāriṇastadyathā śuklasya parasya nirbhāsajyotsnāyā vā rātryāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1528: upapattyāyatane tulāvanāmonnāmayogena cyavate pratisandhi ca vadhnāti /
T06asabhs_u:1532: sa ca vipākastata ūrdhvamindriyābhinrivṛttiḥ yathā pratityasamutpāde catṛsṛṣvāyoniṣu /
T06asabhs_u:1538: bhagavatā tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī samudayasatyanirdeśena nirdiṣṭā //
T06asabhs_u:1542: tatha hi tṛṣṇā vastusarvatragā avasthāsarvatragā adhvasarvatragā dhātusarvatragā eṣaṇā sarvatragā prakārasarvatragā ca keśaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1543: parisaṃkhyānato 'pi lakṣaṇato 'pyutthāna to 'pyālambanato 'pi saṃprayogato 'pi paryāyato 'pi vipratipattito 'pi dhatuto 'pi nikāyato 'pi prahāṇato 'pi kleśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1548: ta eva dṛṣṭeḥ pañcākārjabhedena daśa bhavanti //
T06asabhs_u:1550: yo dharma utpadyamāno 'praśāntalakṣaṇa utpadyamānena yena kāya cittaprabandhāpraśamapravṛttiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1553: kleśānuśayaścāprahīṇo bhavati kleśasthānīyaśca dharma ābhāsagato bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:1554: tatra ca ayoniśo manaskāraḥ pratyavasthito bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:1559: api khalu kāmāvacaraḥ kleśaḥ sthāpayitvā avidyā dṛṣṭi vicikitsāṃ ca tadanyaḥ urdhvabhūmyanālambanaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1573: pratigho rāgeṇa mānena dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:1574: mānaḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:1580: dṛṣṭiḥ pratighena vicikitsayā ca na saṃprayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:1583: styānamauddhatyamāśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādaśca sarvatra kliṣṭe saṃprayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:1586: saṃyojanaṃ bandhanaṃ anuśayaḥ upakleśaḥ paryavasthānam oghaḥ yogaḥ upādānam granthaḥ
T06asabhs_u:1587: nivaraṇam khilaḥ malaḥ nighaḥ śalyaḥ kiṃcanaḥ duścaritam āsravaḥ vighātaḥ paridāhaḥ
T06asabhs_u:1589: saṃyojanāni kati kathaṃ saṃyojanaṃ kutra saṃyojanam /
T06asabhs_u:1591: anunayasaṃyojanam pratighasaṃyojanam mānasaṃyojanam avidyāsaṃyojanam dṛṣṭisaṃyojanam parāmarśasaṃyojanam vicikitsāsaṃyojanam īrṣyāsaṃyojanam mātsaryasaṃyojanaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:1599: sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu na dharmeṣu cittasya vihiṃsā /
T06asabhs_u:1610: sadṛśāt śreyānasmi śreyasā sadṛśo 'smīti vā yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1616: aprāpta uttare viśeṣā dhigame prāpto mayeti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1632: dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena saṃprayukto mithyāniḥsaraṇaṃ parikalpitavipratisāraṃ paryeṣane abhiniviśate /
T06asabhs_u:1642: vicikitsāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu ratneṣu vicikitsate ratnatrayaṃ na samudāvarati /
T06asabhs_u:1647: īrṣyāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto lābhasatkārān anunayati dharmaṃ na gurukaroti /
T06asabhs_u:1652: mātsaryasaṃyojanena saṃprayukta upacayamanunayati ta dvarjanatāṃ ca na satkaroti /
T06asabhs_u:1660: apica rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalasamudācāreṣu na vaśavarttitāṃ labhate /
T06asabhs_u:1663: kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayaḥ bhavarāgānuśayaḥ mānānuśayaḥ avidyānuśayaḥ dṛṣṭayanuśayaḥ vicikitsānuśayaśca /
T06asabhs_u:1680: te sattvā hīnapratipakṣaṃ labhante mado mānaścotpadyate āryasatyeṣu saṃmohaśca /
T06asabhs_u:1681: mithyāmokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca saṃtorayanti buddhaśāsanadharmavinayeṣu vimatiḥ vicikitsā ca //
T06asabhs_u:1684: kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1686: ṣaḍrāgādīn kleśān sthāpayitvā kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ krodhādikaścaitasiko dharmaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1687: api khalu rāgo dveṣo mohaśca caitasikā upakleśā ucyante /
T06asabhs_u:1688: yaiścitte upakleśo na vairāgyaṃ na viumokṣo nāvaraṇaprahāṇam /
T06asabhs_u:1690: tathā ca bhagavatoktam dīrgharātraṃ vo rāgadveṣamohā upakliśyantui vikṣipanti citraṃ saṃkliśyanti /
T06asabhs_u:1693: punaḥ punaḥ udvegena cittaṃ paryayanahyantīti paryavasthānāni /
T06asabhs_u:1694: tathāca śamathapragrahanimittabhāvanākāle tatsanniśraya brahmacaryā diśuddhi saṃgṛhītaśīla kāle cittaṃ paryavanahyanti //
T06asabhs_u:1720: ātmavādopādāne tu tīrthyā anyo 'nyaṃ na vivadanti /
T06asabhs_u:1733: kāmacchandanivaraṇam vyāpādanivaraṇam styānamiddhanivaraṇam auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇam vicikitsānivaraṇaṃ ca /
T06asabhs_u:1735: tacca pravrajyāyāmabhiratau codanāyāṃ pratipattau śamathe pragrahe upekṣāyāṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:1739: cittasyādāntatayā akarmaṇyatayā durvimokṣatayā ca sattvaistasyāścaryāyā durbhedyatvāt khila ityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:1743: tat saṃprajānabdiḥ sabrahmacāribhirgrāme vā araṇye vā tathā kurvantaṃ paśyadbhirucyate ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmān karotyevaṃ kṛtyaṃ caratyevamācaritaṃ grāmakaṇṭaka āmiṣo 'śuciḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1747: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya dīrghakālaṃ punaḥ punarjātimaraṇeṣu vilaśyante ityucyante nighāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1750: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu vā adhyeṣaṇāsamutpādena prabandhānupacchedena
T06asabhs_u:1751: buddhe dharme saṃghe duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgeṣu vā vicikitsāsamutpādena vā śalyā nāma //
T06asabhs_u:1754: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya vittasaṃcayeṣu sabhayāḥ savairā bhūyo vihāravikṣepāḥ kiṃcanā nāma /
T06asabhs_u:1775: abhāve vighāte sarvadā dāridya duḥkhādibhiḥ kliṣṭā bhavantīti vighātāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1779: tena nimittānuvyañjanābhiniveśena kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1786: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa śastrādānadaṇḍādibhiḥ raṇayanti nānāvidhaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalahaṃ kurvantīti rāgādayo raṇā ucyante //
T06asabhs_u:1789: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa adharmarāgeṇa mahādahanena paridahanti viṣamalobhena mahādahanena paridahanti mithyādharmeṇa mahādahanena paridahantīti jvarā nāma //
T06asabhs_u:1792: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa jātimaraṇamūleṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃyojayanti saṃjanayanti sattvān nānāvidhakāyeṣu pañcagatisaṃsāreṣu abhinirvarttayantīti rāgādayo vanasā ityucyante //
T06asabhs_u:1795: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa kāyasāpekṣatā vittasāpekṣatā bodhyabhāvaḥ kolāhalaratiḥ parittakuśaladharmalābhe 'pi santoṣaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1799: rāgaḥ pratighaśca dvau kleśau viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipannau /
T06asabhs_u:1805: daśa kleśā duḥkhe samudaye ca vipratipannāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1807: punaḥ daśa kleśā nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1812: api khalu rāgaḥ kāmadhātau sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhi saṃprayujyate /
T06asabhs_u:1821: yathā mānastathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaśca //
T06asabhs_u:1839: api khalu rāgaḥ pratigho mānaśca kāmadhātau vastvekadeśapravṛttikāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1840: kāmadhātuvad rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātāvapi śiṣṭāḥ kleśāḥ sarvatra sarvavastu pravṛttikāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1850: rūpadhātau duḥkhādicaturvidhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ pratyekaṃ navakleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
T06asabhs_u:1852: evaṃ ca darśanaprahātavyakleśanikāyā dvādaśādhikaṃ śataṃ kleśāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1854: sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antaprāhadṛṣṭiḥ rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā ca /
T06asabhs_u:1855: rūpadhātau bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ pañca kleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham /
T06asabhs_u:1868: anutpannasyānutpādata utpannasya varjanato vā pratipakṣa lābhamārgaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:1871: asaṃbhinnālambanena manaskāreṇa sarvadharmā anātmāna iti paśyati /
T06asabhs_u:1880: yathā yathā dauṣṭhulyamutpadyate tathā tathā pratipakṣa utpadyate yathā yathā pratipakṣa utpadyate tathā tathā dauṣṭhulyanirodhaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1889: upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyavasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1895: tāni trīṇi kāyavāṅmanaskarmāṇi akuśalāni kuśalāni ca /
T06asabhs_u:1897: prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānam kāmamithyācāraḥ mṛṣāvādaḥ piśunavāk paruṣavāk saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ abhidyā vyāpādaḥ mithyādṛṣṭiśca /
T06asabhs_u:1900: prāṇātipātād viratiḥ adattādānādviratiḥ kāmamithyācārādviratiḥ mṛṣāvādādviratiḥ piśunavāco
T06asabhs_u:1901: viratiḥ paruṣavāco viratiḥ saṃbhinnapralāpādviratiḥ anabhidhyā avyāpādaḥ samyagdṛṣṭiśca //
T06asabhs_u:1905: katamāni cetanākarmāṇi parājñaptisaṃcetanīyatākarma paramasaṃjñaptisaṃcetatīyatākarma avijñāyasaṃcetanīyatākarma mūlābhiniveśasacetanīyatākarma viparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1906: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatākarma viparyāsaṃcetana yatā karma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1907: teṣu mūlābhiniveśasaṃcetanīyatā karmaviparyāsasaṃcetanīyatākarmabhyāṃ yadi kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ ca na nāsya vipākaḥ pratisaṃvedyate /
T06asabhs_u:1913: tanna daśānāmakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ triṣu apāyeṣu /
T06asabhs_u:1916: adhipatiphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vipattiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1918: daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ devamanuṣyamatiṣūpapadyamānānāṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vipākaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1919: niṣyandaphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇa ātmābhāvaparigrahayoḥ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate /
T06asabhs_u:1920: adhipattiphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate /
T06asabhs_u:1921: kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ sugatau durgatau ca vipāko 'bhinirvarttate /
T06asabhs_u:1927: yena ekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhavanākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā anekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā //
T06asabhs_u:1930: kāye yad audārikaṃ pūrvaṃ pacyate cyutikāle pratyupasthitaṃ vā pūrvaṃ bahulīkāratāṃ gataṃ vā atrasamācaritaṃ vā /
T06asabhs_u:1932: yaduktaṃ sūtre trividhaṃ karma puṇyakarma apuṇya karma āniṃjyakarma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1939: yaduktaṃ sūtre avidyālambanāḥ saṃskārāḥ puṇyāniṃjyā apuṇyāniṃjyāśceti /
T06asabhs_u:1957: yaduktaṃ sūtre sādhāraṇaṃ karma asādhāraṇaṃ karma valavatkarma durvalaṃ karma ca /
T06asabhs_u:1966: yathā sattvānāmānyaiḥ sattvaiḥ saha anyonyaṃ darśanādikaṃ nopabhogo nopalabdhiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:1971: prātipakṣikakarmabalavataḥ sarvaṃ saṃcetanīyaṃ kuśalaṃ karma balavadityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1972: tatkarma niśrityoktaṃ bhagavatā mamāryaśrāvakā apramāṇavaipulyakarmaṇi cittaṃ kuśalaṃ
T06asabhs_u:1973: paribhāvayanti abhisaṃskṛte sapramāṇe karmaṇi nākṣipanti nāvasthāpayanti na parihāpayanti tatsaṃkhyāte /
T06asabhs_u:1974: yadapi pratipakṣadurbalapugdalasya saṃcetanīyamakuśalaṃ karma tadapi kuśalātkarmaṇo (Abhidh-s 56)
T06asabhs_u:1976: yat punaḥ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma niyatavipākamaprahīṇamaparijñātaṃ tad balavat karma ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1977: tanmanasi nidhāyoktaṃ sarvaṃ ca kuśalākuśalaṃ karma niyatavipākamāryamārgeṇa prahīṇaṃ balavat karma ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1978: yadapi kāmapratisaṃyuktamakuśalaṃ karma yadapi pūrvamabhyastaṃ yadapi padasthaṃ yadapyasādhyamabhisaṃskṛtaṃ karma aparinirvāṇadharmataḥ tadapi prakṛtyā balavat karma ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:1981: tadyathā kṣetrataḥ vastutaḥ svabhāvataḥ āśrayataḥ manasikārataḥ āśayataḥ sahāyataḥ bahulīkārataḥ bāhujanyataśca //
T06asabhs_u:1983: bhagavatoktaṃ ya evaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā
T06asabhs_u:1984: vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso na bhavatyavakāśaśca na prajñāyate
T06asabhs_u:1986: yastvevaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalo yathāvedanīyaṃ karma karotyupacinoti tathā
T06asabhs_u:1987: tathā yathāvedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso bhavatyavakāśaśca
T06asabhs_u:1990: tatra buddhā manasyevaṃ mithyāvacanaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāmayante /
T06asabhs_u:1991: yat sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate duḥkhasahagatasya
T06asabhs_u:1992: karmaṇo duḥkhasahagata eva vipāko 'bhinirvarttate aduḥkhāsukhasahagatasya karmaṇastatsahagata
T06asabhs_u:1996: sukhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
T06asabhs_u:1997: duḥkhasahagatasya karmaṇaḥ sukhavedanīyasya sukhavipāko 'nujñāyate duḥkhavedanīyasya duḥkhavipāko 'nujñāyate aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasyāduḥkhāsukhavipāko 'nujñāyate /
T06asabhs_u:2004: prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma dhyānasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma anāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma ca //
T06asabhs_u:2007: bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ bhikṣuṇīsaṃvaraḥ śikṣamāṇavasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraḥ śrāmaṇerī saṃvaraḥ upāsakasaṃvaraḥ upāsikāsaṃvaraḥ upavāsasaṃvaraśca //
T06asabhs_u:2025: dauḥśīlyasamutthāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ vījopaghāte sati kāmebhyo vītarāgasya yā viratiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2035: abhijanmato vā tatkarmasamādānato vā tatkarmādhyācāraniścayaḥ asaṃvara ityucyate /
T06asabhs_u:2037: aurabhrikāḥ kaukkṛṭikāḥ śaukarikāḥ śākunikāḥ mātsyikāḥ lubdhakāḥ vāgurikāḥ corāḥ
T06asabhs_u:2038: ghātakāḥ govaṃdhakāḥ nāgavaṃdhakāḥ māṇḍalikāḥ nāgamaṇḍalikāḥ kārāgārikāḥ sūcakāḥ
T06asabhs_u:2043: sukhavedanīyaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karma ca //
T06asabhs_u:2045: kāmāvacarāt tṛtīyadhyānaṃ yāvad yat kuśalaṃ karma //
T06asabhs_u:2051: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karma ca //
T06asabhs_u:2053: tatkarma dṛṣṭe dharme yasya vipāko vipacyate /
T06asabhs_u:2054: tacca maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasyaṃ parihāṇiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
T06asabhs_u:2055: yathā maitrīsamāpatteruccalitasya tathā araṇasamāpatteruccalitasya niurodhasamāpatteruccalitasya strotāpattiphalāduccalitasya arhattvaphalāduccalitasya ca /
T06asabhs_u:2056: buddhapramukhe saṃghe kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca kurvataḥ dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
T06asabhs_u:2057: anyeṣāṃ tīvrāśayaprayogeṇa kuśalākuśalakarmapratipannānāmapi dṛṣṭe dharme vipāko labhyate //
T06asabhs_u:2059: tatkarma anantare janmani yasya vipāko vipacyate /
T06asabhs_u:2061: api ca yānyanyāni kuśalākuśalāni karmāṇi yeṣāmanantare janmani vipāko vipacyate tatsarvamucyate upapadyavedanīyaṃ karma //
T06asabhs_u:2066: kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākaṃ karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ karma akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ karma //
T06asabhs_u:2072: kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ karma yat karma vā āśayataḥ prayogato vā śuklaṃ yat karma vā prayogataḥ kṛṣṇamāśayataḥ śuklam //
T06asabhs_u:2074: prayogānantaryamārge 'nāsravaṃ karma aviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasyānāsravakarmaṇaḥ paripanthamānukūlyasvabhāvamadhikṛtya
T06asabhs_u:2075: vaṃkadoṣakaṣāyāṇāṃ śauceyānāṃ mauneyānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
T06asabhs_u:2078: nidānataḥ utthānataḥ pradeśataḥ svabhāvataśca dānakarma vikalpyate /
T06asabhs_u:2085: api ca aniśritadānataḥ mahāśucidānataḥ parama prahṛṣṭadānataḥ abhikṣṇadānataḥ kṣetrabhājanadānataḥ navapurāṇasaṃvibhāgadānataśca dānasaṃpad veditavyā //
T06asabhs_u:2087: anabhidutadeyavastutaḥ aparāpakṛtadeyavastutaḥ akuthitavimaladeyavastutaḥ śucideyavastutaḥ dharmārjitadeyavastutaśca deyasaṃpad veditavyā //
T06asabhs_u:2089: tathācoktaṃ sūtre śīlasamanvāgataḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛta ācāragocarasaṃpanno 'ṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu mahābhayadarśī śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu iti //
T06asabhs_u:2100: ataḥ paraṃ śīlamārabhya yad buddhena sūtreṣu nirdṛṣṭaṃ kāyena saṃvṛto bhavatītyevamādi //
T06asabhs_u:2106: avipratisārādīnāṃ krameṇa saṃpratipattyā yāvat samādhilābhasanniśraya taḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2130: karmasvakā karmadāyādāḥ karmayonīyāḥ karmapratisaraṇāḥ karma sarvān sattvān vibhajati uccanīcatayā hīnapraṇītatayā (Abhidh-s 61) iti //
T06asabhs_u:2140: yat karmaṇā sugatau durgatau vātmabhāvaprabhedaṃ labhante //
T06asabhs_u:2146: akuśalasya karmaṇo hīnāsu tisṛṣu durgatiṣu aniṣṭavipākalābhaścintyaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2154: tadyathā āyurvaśitayā cittavaśitayā pariṣkāravaśitayā karmavaśitayā upapattivaśitayā adhimuktivaśitayā praṇidhānavaśitayā ṛddhivaśitayā jñānavaśitayā dharmavaśitayā /
T06asabhs_u:2157: tathā ca samudayasatyaṃ samāsato lakṣaṇaprabhedena caturvidham /
T06asabhs_u:2160: punarbhavavāsanāyā āhārakaṃ kāraṇaṃ heturiti hetulakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
T06asabhs_u:2162: teṣāṃ teṣāmupacitavāsanānāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye udayasya kāraṇamiti (Abhidh-s 62)
T06asabhs_u:2165: pratyātmaṃ santānānāṃ sarvaprakāraprakarṣodbhavasya kāraṇamiti prabhavalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
T06asabhs_u:2170: lakṣaṇataḥ gāmbhīryataḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthataḥ aparipūritaḥ paripūritaḥ niralaṃkārataḥ sālaṃkārataḥ śeṣataḥ aśeṣataḥ agrataḥ paryāyataśca nirodhasatyaṃ veditavyam //
T06asabhs_u:2172: tathatāyāmārya mārge kleśānāmanutpādo yo nirodhāśrayo nirodhako nirodhasvabhāvo vā //
T06asabhs_u:2175: manaśca teṣu āyataneṣu nāmarūpayorātyantikanirodho na śeṣaḥ iti /
T06asabhs_u:2176: yaccoktaṃ tadāyatanaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā cakṣuśca nirudhyate rūpasaṃjñā ca virajyate yāvat manaśca nirudhyate dharmasaṃjñā ca virajyate iti /
T06asabhs_u:2177: anena nayena ālambanānāṃ prāpaṇaṃ tathatāyāmālambanādūrdhvaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2181: tathoparamāt teṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodho nānyo vācyaḥ nānanyo vācyaḥ nāpyanyo nāpyananyo vācyaḥ na naivānyo nānanyo vācyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2184: asmiṃstvarthe prapañcotpattiḥ na saṃcintyā na mārgeṇa na nyāyena na kuśalaprayogeṇa cintyā iti /
T06asabhs_u:2185: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ spraṣṭāvyayatanānāṃ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi /
T06asabhs_u:2187: syānnaivānyo nānanyo 'pi iti niṣprapañca prapañca utpadyate //
T06asabhs_u:2189: yadā ṣaḍāyatanānāṃ nirodhaśchedaḥ tadā prapañcānāṃ viratiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2196: śaikṣāṇāṃ strotāpannaphalasaṃgraheṇa vā sakṛdāgamiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā anāgāmiphalasaṃgraheṇa vā yo nirodhaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2202: ubhayabhāga vimuktānāṃ traividyānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñānāmarhatāṃ yo nirodhaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2211: aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargaḥ vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi //
T06asabhs_u:2259: kimupādāya sa nirodhaḥ punaḥ sauvarṇikamityucyate paramārthasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya //
T06asabhs_u:2290: yena duḥkhaṃ parijānīte samudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T06asabhs_u:2295: pṛthagjanānāṃ śīlam indriyadvārarakṣā bhojane mātrājñatā prathamarātrau taduttararātriṣu vā nityamamiddhaṃ vīryabhāvanā śamathavipaśyanā saṃprajanyavihāraśca
T06asabhs_u:2296: yadvā punaranyadaupaniṣadaṃ kuśalam śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā bhāvanāmayī prajñā //
T06asabhs_u:2301: saṃbhāramārgopacitāni nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni ūṣmagataḥ mūrdhānaḥ satyānukūlakṣānti laukikāgradharmaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2303: pratyātmaṃ satye pvālokalabdhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2312: samāsato laukikā gradharmānantaramanupalambhaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā saṃyogaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2316: duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
T06asabhs_u:2317: samudaye dharmajñānaṃ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānaṃ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
T06asabhs_u:2318: nirodhe dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ nirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ
T06asabhs_u:2328: pūrvādhipatibalavicāraṇāmupādāya pratyātmaṃ duḥkhasatye pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā /
T06asabhs_u:2332: kṣāntyanantaraṃ yena jñānena pūrvoktebhyaḥ kleśebhyo vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T06asabhs_u:2335: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāne ca pratyātmaṃ pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā utpadyate yaduttaramanvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇām
T06asabhs_u:2346: api ca eṣu sarveṣu kṣāntijñāneṣu animittaprekṣāvihārī veditavyaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2353: tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena prāpaṇanimittapramāṇaiḥ nāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ mārgasatyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti /
T06asabhs_u:2355: abhisamayaprayuktā laukikena jñānena yathāvyavasthānaṃ vikalpoyanto yadabhyasyanti //
T06asabhs_u:2362: yaduktaṃ sūtre virajño vītamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūdapādi iti /
T06asabhs_u:2364: tatra dharmakṣāntibhirvirajaḥ dharmajñānairvītamalam parijñayā prahāṇena mārgaśuddhilābhena ca //
T06asabhs_u:2365: yaduktaṃ sūtre dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā sarvaiḥ tīrṇakāṃkṣaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2366: tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayaḥ śāstuḥ śāsano 'nanyaneyaḥ dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta
T06asabhs_u:2374: aparapratyayaḥ mārgabhāvanāyāṃ na parataḥ svayaṃ kuśalāvarjanena /
T06asabhs_u:2379: darśanamārgādūrdhvaṃ laukiko mārgo lokottaramārgaḥ mṛdumārgo madhyamārgo 'dhimātro mārgaḥ prayogamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ vimuktimārgaḥ viśeṣamārgaśca
T06asabhs_u:2381: laukikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamākāśānattyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanamākiñcatyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2389: tathā ca saṃkliṣṭacetasāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ kleśopakleśāḥ pravarttante //
T06asabhs_u:2396: pañcāṅgāni vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca //
T06asabhs_u:2398: catvāryaṅgāni adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāpratā ca //
T06asabhs_u:2400: pañcāṅgāni upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca //
T06asabhs_u:2402: catvāryaṅgāni upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiḥ aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā cittaikāgratā ca //
T06asabhs_u:2403: pratipakṣāṅgamupādāya anuśaṃsāṅgamupādāya tadubhayāśrayasvabhāvāṅgaṃ copādāya ārupyeṣvaṅgavyavasthānaṃ nāsti /
T06asabhs_u:2409: lakṣaṇaprati saṃvedī manaskāraḥ ādhimokṣikaḥ prāvivejaḥ ratisaṃgrāhakaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ prayoganiṣṭhaḥ prayoganiṣṭhāphalaśca (Abhidh-s 69)
T06asabhs_u:2414: mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitasya prathamasya dhyānasya phalaṃ trividhā prathamā dhyānopapattiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2415: yathā prathamasya dhyānasya evaṃ śiṣṭānāṃ dhyānānāṃ trividhā dhyānopapattiḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2420: teṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nāmābhijñā api na bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:2423: prāntakoṭikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvannaiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ viśuddhirityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:2425: bhāvanāmārge duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni dharmajñānānvayapakṣyāṇi taiśca saṃprayuktaḥ samādhiḥ prathamaṃ vā dhyānaṃ yāvadākiñcanyāyatanaṃ
T06asabhs_u:2428: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā yāvadeva saṃjñāsamāpattiḥ tāvadājñāprativedha iti /
T06asabhs_u:2435: mṛdumṛdurmṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇā kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmāvadhimātrādhimātramadhimātramadhyamadhimātrāmṛduṃ kleśaprakāra prajahāti //
T06asabhs_u:2437: madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau madhyādhimātraṃ madhyamadhyaṃ madhyamṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti //
T06asabhs_u:2439: adhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśca yena traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ bhūmau bhūmau mṛdvadhimātraṃ mṛdumadhyaṃ mṛdumṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti //
T06asabhs_u:2448: api khalu kleśaprahāṇaprayogaṃ nirākṛtya dharmacintāyāṃ vā prayuktasya dharmavihāre vā samāpattiviśeṣe vā yo mārgaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2449: api khalu vaiśeṣikān guṇānabhinirharato vā yo mārgaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2455: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatāyai yā bhāvanā /
T06asabhs_u:2457: utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya yā bhāvanā //
T06asabhs_u:2460: api khalu mārga utpadyamānaḥ svāṃ vāsanāmava sthāpayati sā pratilambhabhāvanā /
T06asabhs_u:2461: sa eva saṃmukhībhūto bhāvanāṃ gacchati sā niṣevaṇabhāvanā /
T06asabhs_u:2464: api khalu caturvidhaḥ pratipakṣaḥ vidūṣaṇāpratipakṣaḥ prahāṇapratipakṣaḥ ādhārapratipakṣaḥ dūrībhāvapratipakṣaśca pratipakṣabhāvanetyucyate
T06asabhs_u:2473: api khalu vastuparīkṣāmārgaḥ vyāvasāyiko mārgaḥ samādhiparikarmamārgaḥ abhisamayaprāyogiko
T06asabhs_u:2474: mārgaḥ abhisamayaśliṣṭo mārgaḥ abhisamayamārgaḥ viśuddhinairyāṇiko mārgaḥ niśrayendriyabhinno
T06asabhs_u:2475: mārgaḥ śikṣātrayapariśodhano mārgaḥ sarvaguṇanirhārako mārgaḥ mārgasaṃgrahamārgaśca mārga ityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:2476: sa punareṣa yathākramaṃ saptatriṃśadabodhipakṣā dharmāḥ catasraḥ pratipadaḥ catvāri dharmapadāni śamatha(ai)
T06asabhs_u:2478: smṛtyupasthānānāmālamvanaṃ svabhāvaḥ sahāyaḥ bhāvanā bhāvanāphalañca veditavyam /
T06asabhs_u:2482: api khalvātmāśrayavastu ātmopabhogavastu ātmavastu ātmasaṃkleśavyavadānavastu ca //
T06asabhs_u:2507: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā evaṃ vedanādiṣu vedanādyanupaśyanā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2508: api khalu bhāvanā chando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāhaḥ utsūḍhiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ apramādaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2527: taduktaṃ sūtre chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryamārabhate cittaṃ pragṛṇhāti cittaṃ pradadhāti /
T06asabhs_u:2542: chandovīryaṃ cittaṃ mīmāṃsā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2551: punaḥ chandasamādhiḥ yat chandaṃ janayan spṛśati cittasyaikagratām //
T06asabhs_u:2553: cittasamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pradadhat spṛśati cittasyaigratām //
T06asabhs_u:2554: mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ yat cittaṃ pragṛṇhan spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām //
T06asabhs_u:2558: chandaḥ vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā praśrabdhiḥ smṛtiḥ saṃprajanyaṃ cetanā upekṣā ca /
T06asabhs_u:2565: api ca teṣu teṣu dharmeṣu adhigamaḥ prātiḥ karmaṇyatā vaśitā kāritraṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nānāvidhānāmṛdudhyādīnāṃ vastūnāṃ niṣpādanamadhiguṇānāṃ nirhāraśca
T06asabhs_u:2570: śraddhā vīrya smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā ca //
T06asabhs_u:2586: smṛtiḥ dharmavicayaḥ vīryaṃ prītiḥ praśrabdhiḥ samādhiḥ upekṣā ca //
T06asabhs_u:2605: samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyakkarmmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiśca //
T06asabhs_u:2619: duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā //
T06asabhs_u:2630: adhyātmaṃ cittasya upanibandhaḥ sthāpanā saṃsthāpanā avasthāpanā upasthāpanā damanaṃ śamanaṃ vyupaśamanam ekotīkaraṇaṃ samādhānaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2632: yā dharmān vicinoti pravivinoti parivitarkkayati parimīmāṃsamāpataye /
T06asabhs_u:2633: ca kāma pratipakṣadauṣṭhulyanimittasaṃyojanataḥ kāmābhibhavānāṃ viparyāsataḥ aviparyastacittasyāvasthāpanataśca //
T06asabhs_u:2639: ekatyaḥ na śamathasya lābhī nāpi vipaśyanāyāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2642: tasya śamathavipaśyanobhayamārga yuktasya samaṃ yugapat pravṛttiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2651: prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakānyapi bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
T06asabhs_u:2653: yathā prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti tathā sarvepāmūrdvabhūmikānāṃ bhāvanāmārge adhobhūmikāni kuśalamūlakāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti /
T06asabhs_u:2658: tadanantaraṃ nirantarāśrayapravṛttiḥ prāptakṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ daśāśaikṣā dharmāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2660: aśaikṣasya samyagdṛṣṭiryāyada śaikṣasya samyaksamādhiḥ aśaikṣasya samyagvimokṣaḥ aśaikṣasya samyag jñānaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2675: bhāvanāmārgagatasya taduttaraṃ saṃyojanaprahāṇamārgavasthāyāṃ yaḥ samādhiḥ prayogamārgasaṃgraho vā ānantaryamārgasaṃgraho vā /
T06asabhs_u:2676: prayogamārgasaṃgrahastu tataḥ paraṃ sarvairāvaraṇairacchādyaḥ sarvāvarāṇānāṃ ca bhedaka iti /
T06asabhs_u:2678: sa ca samādhiḥ nirantaraḥ dṛḍhaḥ ekarasaḥ vyāpī ca //
T06asabhs_u:2680: bhagavatoktaṃ tadyathā mahāśailaparvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekaghanaḥ susaṃvṛtto daśadigvātākampyaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2686: hetukṣayeṇa yad śānaṃ labhyate kṣayaviṣayā lambanaṃ vā //
T06asabhs_u:2688: phalaprahāṇena yad jñānaṃ labhyate phalānutpattiviṣayālambanaṃ vā //
T06asabhs_u:2689: daśāśaikṣā dharmāstu aśaikṣāṇāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyāḥ
T06asabhs_u:2703: kena hetunā satyeṣu anityaduḥkhādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa lauaukikākārāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2706: lokottarākāreṣu varttamāno 'nityārthaṃ paśyati sākṣādanubhavati notvanityaṃ paśyati abhilāpaprapañcamukhena /
T06asabhs_u:2707: yathā anityākārā anityārthe evaṃ śiṣṭhākarāḥ śiṣṭārtheṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2713: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ nidānam avadānam itivṛtakaṃ jātakaṃ vaipulyam adbhutadharmaḥ upadeśaśca //
T06asabhs_u:2716: daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyan tathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati sukhaṃ vyavasthāpayati sukhaṃ deśayati /
T06asabhs_u:2717: śrotāpi sukhamudgṛṇhāti dharmagauravatayā kṣipraṃ bodhi saṃbhārān paripūrayati āśudharmatāṃ pratividhyati /
T06asabhs_u:2718: buddhe 'vetyaprasādaṃ labhate dharme saṃghe cāvetya prasādaṃ labhate /
T06asabhs_u:2723: sūtrāṇāṃ madhye vā ante vā gāthayā yad gīyate /
T06asabhs_u:2732: dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadī paṃcapadī ṣaṭpadī vā //
T06asabhs_u:2759: evaṃ sūtrādīni dvādaśāṅgānyāryaśāsanāni triṣu piṭakeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:2764: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ caitāni pañca śrāvakāṇāṃ piṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:2765: nidānamavadānamitivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ caitāni catvāri dvayoḥ piṭakayoḥ saparivāre vinayapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:2766: vaipulyamadbhutadharmaśca ete dve bodhisattvapiṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhīte bhavataḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2767: upadeśa ekaḥ śrāvakabodhisattvapiṭakayoḥ abhidharmapiṭake saṃgṛhīto bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:2778: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
T06asabhs_u:2780: yaduktaṃ sutre cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ sālambanāḥ sākāraḥ sāśrayāḥ sasaṃprayogāśca /
T06asabhs_u:2803: catvāri āryasatyāni ṣoḍaśākārāḥ tathatā sarve anityāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve duḥkhā saṃskārāḥ sarve 'nātmāno dharmāḥ nirvāṇaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyamapraṇihitamanimittaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2807: ṣoḍaśākāreṣu śūnye kati ākārāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
T06asabhs_u:2820: skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyuasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:2824: yat dharmā dharmānabhiniṣyandayanti nahyeṣāṃ nirhetuko nāpi viṣamahetuka utpāda itīdaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam /
T06asabhs_u:2827: yad adhobhūmikānāmaudarikatā ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ śāntatā tathatā catvāryasatyāni ca /
T06asabhs_u:2839: anādikālāt svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇasthitadharmeṣu yā dharmatāpariniṣpattiḥ sā dharmatā //
T06asabhs_u:2856: nāmaparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ /
T06asabhs_u:2869: saṃbhṛtabodhisaṃbhārasya ūṣmagatādiṣu āryasatyeṣu ca yad vāhuśrutyam //
T06asabhs_u:2907: kena kāraṇena vaipulyaṃ audāryaṃ gāmbhīrya ca deśyate /
T06asabhs_u:2914: kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyāḥ sattvā adhimucyante /
T06asabhs_u:2917: idaṃ ca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye bodhisattvasya yathāruta mayoniśo dharmānvicinvataḥ aṣṭāviṃśatirasadṛṣṭaya utpadyante
T06asabhs_u:2920: pariṇatidṛṣṭiḥ anavadyatādṛṣṭiḥ niḥsaraṇadṛṣṭiḥ avajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiḥ viparītadṛṣṭiḥ
T06asabhs_u:2921: prasavadṛṣṭiḥ anabhyupagamadṛṣṭiḥ kusṛtidṛṣṭiḥ satkāradṛṣṭi dṛḍhamūḍhatādṛṣṭiḥ mūladṛṣṭiḥ
T06asabhs_u:2929: api khalu parikalpite svabhāve lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya paratantre utpattiniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya pariniṣpanne paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya
T06asabhs_u:2949: tatra pañcavidhāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvattirtamiti darśayati /
T06asabhs_u:2950: pañcavidhā bhāvanā saṃbhinnabhāvanā animittabhāvanā anābhogabhāvanā uttaptabhāvanā parivṛttinibhaḥ(?)
T06asabhs_u:2952: kena kāraṇena vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakadharmaḥ sarvasattvahitasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya //
T06asabhs_u:2961: roga caritaprabhedataḥ niryāṇaprabhedataḥ ādhāraprabhedataḥ prayogaprabhedataḥ phalaprabhedataḥ dhātuprabhedataḥ caryāprabhedataśca //
T06asabhs_u:2964: rāgacaritaḥ dveṣacarita mohacaritaḥ mānacaritaḥ vitarkacaritaḥ samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaska caritaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2975: śraddhādhimuktaḥ dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimuktaḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ strotāpattiphalapratipakṣakaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2977: arhattvaphalapratipannakaḥ arhan saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ kulaṃkulaḥ ekavīcikaḥ antarāparinirvāyī
T06asabhs_u:2979: parihāṇadharmā arhan cetanādharmā arhan anurakṣaṇādharmā arhan sthitākampyaḥ arhan
T06asabhs_u:2980: prativedhadharmā arhan akopyadharmā arhan ca pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2984: kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaraśca bodhisattvaḥ kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ acintyaśca tathāgataḥ pudgalaprabhedaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2987: adhimukticārī bodhisattvaḥ adhyāśayacārī bodhisattvaḥ nimittacārī bodhisattvaḥ animittacāri bodhisattvaḥ anabhisaṃskāracārī bodhisattvaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ
T06asabhs_u:2990: evaṃ dveṣacarito mohacarito mānacarito vitarkacaritaśca pudgalaḥ tīvrāyataviśiṣṭaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:2997: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā śrāvakadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyaḥ svavimuktaye
T06asabhs_u:3001: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā pratyekabuddhadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā madhyendriyaḥ
T06asabhs_u:3002: svavimuktaye praṇihitaḥ vairāgyabhāvanayā vimuktāśayaḥ kevalabhāvanayā cādhigatavodhyāśayaḥ
T06asabhs_u:3005: ārya mārgasaṃmukhībhūtaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ ekavihārī pratyekajinaḥ varggacāri duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
T06asabhs_u:3007: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā bodhisattvadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sarvasattvavimokṣāya
T06asabhs_u:3009: sattvān paripācayati śuddhāṃ buddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratilabhate samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca sākṣātkaroti //
T06asabhs_u:3011: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya mṛdumātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ mṛdumātrāmokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ aniyatajanmakālikaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3013: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya madhyamātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ madhyamātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgato niyatajanmakālikaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3017: punaḥ asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu mṛdumātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgato mṛdumātra nirvedhabhāgīyasanvāgata anivatajanmakālikaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3018: saṃbhṛtāsaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu madhyamātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ madhyamātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgato nithatajanmakālikaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3019: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu adhimātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ adhimātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ tajjanmakālikaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3020: tatra trimātranirvedhabhāgīyo laukikāgradharmaṃ sthāpayitvā laukikāgradharmaprakṛtyaiva kṣaṇikaḥ aprāvandhikaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3024: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro mṛdvindriyaḥ paropadeśamanusmṛtya yaḥ satyābhisamayāya prayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:3026: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārastīkṣṇendriyaḥ svayameva satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamanusmṛtya yaḥ [satyābhi]samayāya prayujyate //
T06asabhs_u:3048: yadā darśana prahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt [stota ā]panno bhavati //
T06asabhs_u:3049: kena kāraṇena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt strotaāpanno bhavati /
T06asabhs_u:3056: api khalu jñeyavipra[tipatti]kāraṇatāmupādāya dṛṣṭivipratipattikāraṇatāmupādāya pratipakṣavipratipattikāraṇatāṃ copādāya //
T06asabhs_u:3058: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ pañcaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:3060: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarasya ṣaṣṭhasya kleśaprakā[rasya pra] hāṇamārge yaḥ pugdalaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3062: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ saptamāṣṭamānāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3064: bhāvanāmarge kāmāvacarasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3065: yadā sarveṣāṃ kāmāvacarā[ṇāṃ bhāva]nāprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmī bhavati //
T06asabhs_u:3073: bhāvāmrikasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3074: yadā traidhātukānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarvvakleśānāṃ prahāṇādarhan bhavati //
T06asabhs_u:3081: strotaāpanna eva pudgalaḥ saptakṛtvo 'pi miśromiśra devamanuṣyeṣu bhavāt saṃsṛtya yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
T06asabhs_u:3083: deveṣu vā kulātkulaṃ gatvā [manuṣye]ṣu vā yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
T06asabhs_u:3088: yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti abhinivṛtto vā antarābhave upapattibhavagamanāya
T06asabhs_u:3090: abhisaṃcetayitvā vā upapattibhavamabhisaṃprasthitaḥ [bhavānu]papatticchandaṃ yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
T06asabhs_u:3092: ubhayasaṃyojane aprahīṇe rūpadhātāvupapannamātra eva yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
T06asabhs_u:3094: upapannaḥ anabhisaṃskāreṇa yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti //
T06asabhs_u:3098: upapanno rūpāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvadakaniṣṭhagān praviśya tannānāsrava mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
T06asabhs_u:3099: puna kaścid yāvad bhavāgragān mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti /
T06asabhs_u:3100: api ca vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya pañcaprakārā prabhedāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:3102: taiḥ vyavakīrṇābhāvitasya caturthadhyānasya pañcaprabhedaiḥ yathākramaṃ paścasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattiḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3104: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā cetayitvā vā acetayitvā vā dṛṣṭadharmasukha vihārāt parihāṇameti //
T06asabhs_u:3106: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā acetayitvā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti cetayitvā na parihāṇameti //
T06asabhs_u:3111: mṛdvindriya prakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt na parihāṇameti nāpi indriyāṇyuttāpayati //
T06asabhs_u:3113: mṛdvindriyāprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhaviharāt na parihāṇameti kevala mindriyā ṇyuttāpayati //
T06asabhs_u:3115: tīkṣṇendriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto va avikṣipto vā na dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti //
T06asabhs_u:3119: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati adharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:3122: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati āryadharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:3124: yathā kāmāvacarāstrayaḥ tathā rūpāvacarā ārupyavacarā api //
T06asabhs_u:3126: ārūpyadhātuvyavakarṣitena dhyānena saṃprayukto dhyānasukhairviharatīti kāmadhātāvapyupapanno rūpadhātāvapyupapannaḥ pudgala kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:3129: kāmadhātau tuṣitabhavanayāsamārabhya yāvat mahāparinirvāṇaṃ darśayati sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ buddhacaryāṃ mahācaryāṃ darśayatīti pudgalaḥ
T06asabhs_u:3139: acalā sādhumatīdharmameghāsu bhūmiṣu sthito yo bodhisattvaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3140: punaḥ khalu strotaāpannaḥ pugdalo yaduktaḥ sa dvividhaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:3143: sakṛnnairyāṇikaḥ satyābhisamayamabhisaṃpraviṣṭaḥ aprāpta samāpattimāśritya adhigatena lokottaramāgreṇa sakṛta traidhātukāvacarān sarvakleśān prajahāti prakāraśaḥ prajahāti /
T06asabhs_u:3145: sa ca pudgalo bhūyo dṛṣṭe dharme maraṇakāle ājñāmārāgayati /
T06asabhs_u:3152: arthābhisamayaḥ tattvābhisamayaḥ pṛṣṭhābhisamayaḥ ratnābhisamayaḥ asamudācārābhisamayaḥ niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ śrāvakābhisamayaḥ pratyekabuddhābhisamayaḥ bodhisattvābhisamayaśca //
T06asabhs_u:3154: satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrasya adhimuktiprasādasya pratilambhaḥ yathāsaṃpratyayaṃ caryā ca //
T06asabhs_u:3155: arthābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrāyāḥ satyeṣu dhamanidhyānakṣānteḥ pratilambhaḥ /
T06asabhs_u:3162: bhāvanāmārge tatsaṃvṛtijñānāni pratilabhate na tu saṃmukhīkaroti /
T06asabhs_u:3167: buddhe 'vetya prasādaḥ dharme 'tya prasādaḥ saṃghe 'vetya prasādaḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3169: akāraṇasaṃvaralābhāt śikṣāgatasya yadātmano narakakṣayaṃ tiryagyonikṣayaḥ pretayonikṣayaḥ avāṅpatanadurgatikṣayaḥ iti /
T06asabhs_u:3175: śrāvakāṇāṃ parato ghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate //
T06asabhs_u:3181: pūrvokteṣu saptābhisamayeṣu yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ no tu sakṣātkiryā /
T06asabhs_u:3187: parigrahaviśeṣaḥ vyavasthānaviśeṣaḥ pratiṣṭhāparivāraviśeṣaḥ abhijanmaviśeṣaḥ janmaviśeṣaḥ phalaviśeṣaśca /
T06asabhs_u:3195: apramāṇāni vimokṣāḥ abhibhvāyatanāni kṛtsāyatanāni araṇāpraṇīdhijñānam pratisaṃvidaḥ
T06asabhs_u:3196: abhijñā lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni pariśuddhayaḥ valāni vaiśāradyāni smṛtyupasthānāni arakṣāṇi
T06asabhs_u:3197: asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamuddhātaḥ mahākaruṇā āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā
T06asabhs_u:3202: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena saṃprayujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3204: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā duḥkhena viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3206: (Abhidh-s 95) dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena na viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3208: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā hita labheranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3212: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā avibhāvānād draṣṭarī rūpasaṃjñāyāḥ
T06asabhs_u:3213: saṃniveśanād vā dṛśya rūpādi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddho samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca
T06asabhs_u:3216: dhyānaṃ niśritya draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā vibhāvanād arūpasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃniveśanādvā dṛśya rūpāṇi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddhau samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3217: kathaṃ śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti /
T06asabhs_u:3218: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣu anyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāyā anyonyānugamasaṃjñāyā
T06asabhs_u:3219: anyonyaikarasasaṃjñāyāśca labhāt tatra labdhe vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ
T06asabhs_u:3222: vimokṣānukūlā kāśānantyāyatanavimokṣaḥ tathā vijñānānantyāyatanākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanavimokṣā api draṣṭavyaḥ yāvat vimokṣaḥ śānto vimokṣaḥ asaktyāvaraṇaṃ ca //
T06asabhs_u:3224: naivasaṃjñānasaṃjñāyatanavimokṣaṃ niśritya samatikrāntānāṃ śiṣṭe śānte vimokṣe mokṣānusadṛśo
T06asabhs_u:3225: vihāraḥ vihārasamṛddhau ca cittacaitasikānāṃ nirodhaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhāvaraṇād vimuktyartham //
T06asabhs_u:3229: pūrvāṇī catvāri abhibhvāyatanāni dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ vyavasthāpyante /
T06asabhs_u:3230: uttarāṇi catvāri abhibhvāvatanāni ekena vimokṣeṇa vyavasthāpyante /
T06asabhs_u:3241: kṛtsnaspharaṇavihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ kṛtsnāyatanānītyucyante //
T06asabhs_u:3247: dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3249: dhyānaṃ niśritya jñeya jñānapraṇidhisamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3253: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvadharma paryāyeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhīḥ prajñāśeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3258: dhyānaṃ niśritya janapadabhāpāyāmanuvyavahāre dharmanirvacane ca avyāghāta samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3260: dhyānaṃ niśritya dharmaprabhedeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3264: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrarddhivikurvita samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3266: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrāṇāṃ śabdānāmanuśravasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3268: dhyānaṃ niśritya parasattveṣu cittacaritaparyāya praveśasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3270: dhyānaṃ niśritya pūrvāntacaryānusmaraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3272: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvānāṃ cyutyupapādaprakāra saṃdarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3274: dhyānaṃ niśritya āsravakṣayajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3276: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairvibhrājamānasandarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayūktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ tatsamutthitavipākāśca
T06asabhs_u:3280: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamaśrayasyopādāne sthānaparityāgānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhīḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3282: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamālambananirmāṇapariṇāmanajñānānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3284: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ samādhimukhavaśavarttisamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3286: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ dhāraṇīmukhasandhāraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3290: sthānāsthānabalaṃ katamat dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra sthānāsthānajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ
T06asabhs_u:3292: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra karmasvakajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3297: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārajñeyābhisaṃbodhipratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3299: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārasravakṣayapratijñā pratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3301: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākārāntarāyikadharmapratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3303: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākāra nairyāṇikamārgadharma pratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3306: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe sarvākārasaṃkleśāsamudācārasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ purvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3309: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe yathākāmamavavādānuśāsanīprayogasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3311: sarvākārasya yathāvat kṛtassa bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3313: sarvajñasya sataḥ asarvajñaceṣṭitāsamudācārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3315: nirantaraṃ sarvaprakāraduḥkhālambanakaruṇāvihārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat //
T06asabhs_u:3320: asādhāraṇa karmasamudācārasamṛddhau asādhāraṇajñānavihārasamṛddhau ca yaḥ samādhiḥ
T06asabhs_u:3323: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sarvākārajñatāsamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3325: viśuddhāni catvāri dhyānāni niśritya anyatīrthīyaḥ śrāvako bodhisattvo vā abhinirharati catvāri apramāṇānyevaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ /
T06asabhs_u:3326: śeṣān guṇān prāntakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya śrāvako bodhisattvastathāgato vābhinirharati //
T06asabhs_u:3331: ye svakāritrapratyupasthānāḥ te lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhāḥ saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvā draṣṭavyāḥ //
T06asabhs_u:3335: anukampāvihāritayā puṇya saṃbhāraṃ paripūrayati sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidyate //
T06asabhs_u:3338: śubhanirmāṇe na saṃkliśyate śānteṣu vimokṣeṣu na sajjati /
T06asabhs_u:3353: vākkarmaṇā cittādeśanayāvarjayati sattvacaritaṃ ca jñātvā āgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca niḥsaraṇe sattvān yathāvadavavadate //
T06asabhs_u:3358: ākāṅkṣayankalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā tiṣṭhati āyuḥsaṃskārān vā utsṛjati /
T06asabhs_u:3359: dharmavaśavarttī bhavati samādhivaśavartī saddharmaṃ ca sandhārayati //
T06asabhs_u:3361: ahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratyākhāyākṛtābhyāgamavāde ca samyaga bhyudayamārgaṃ deśayati
T06asabhs_u:3362: sattvacittacaritāni cānupraviśya deśanābhājanatāṃ cāśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ cālambanaṃ ca
